title: Cybersecurity Investment Roadmap Schema (IMPACTO Model v0.1)
description: JSON schema defining the structure of a cybersecurity service investment roadmap. This schema captures planned security milestones (e.g., training, exercises, reviews) on a timeline, maturity assessments, and conditional (trigger-based) recommendations for adjusting the roadmap.

model_version.description: Version of the IMPACTO model schema. For v0.1, use "0.1".

service_name.description: Name of the security service or product (e.g., "AppGate SDP").

organization.description: Name of the organization or unit using this roadmap.

milestones.description: List of planned or completed security improvement milestones with schedule and details.

name.description: Brief title of the milestone (e.g., "Admin Training", "Tabletop Exercise").

timeline.description: Scheduled time frame for the milestone (could be a quarter or month, e.g., "2024 Q1" or "Jan 2024").

description.description: Detailed description of the milestone, including its purpose.

outcome.description: Expected or achieved outcome of this milestone (e.g., skills gained, issues found, risk reduced).

status.description: Status of the milestone (e.g., planned, in-progress, completed).

maturity_assessment.description: Maturity level assessment for the security capability, before and target after implementing the roadmap.

initial_level.description: Initial maturity level or score at start (e.g., 1-5 scale, 5 being most mature).

target_level.description: Target maturity level or score to achieve after executing the roadmap.

framework.description: Optional name of maturity model or framework used (e.g., CMMC, NIST CSF, internal scoring).

conditional_recommendations.description: List of AI-assisted conditional recommendations. Each item defines a trigger condition and a recommended action if that condition occurs.

trigger.description: Description of the event/condition that would trigger this recommendation (e.g., "High number of access violations").

recommendation.description: Suggested action to take if the trigger condition occurs (e.g., "Conduct additional staff training").

rationale.description: Explanation of why this recommendation is important if the trigger occurs.
